thread.title: Celta Vigo vs Real Madrid clash called off by Vigo mayor for ‘security concerns’ following stadium inspection
thread.title_full: Celta Vigo vs Real Madrid clash called off by Vigo mayor for ‘security concerns’ following stadium inspection

author: arichardson
title: Celta Vigo vs Real Madrid clash called off by Vigo mayor for ‘security concerns’ following stadium inspection

organizations.name: getty images real madrid’s la liga

text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TOMORROW’S La Liga clash between Celta Vigo and Real Madrid has been called off for security concerns, following a stadium inspection. 
Rainy conditions in the have damaged the roof of the Rio Alto Balaidos Stadium, and the city’s mayor confirmed to a local the match will not go ahead. Getty Images Real Madrid’s La Liga clash with Celta Vigo called off following stadium damage 
More to follow
